article:
Between 1925 and 1945, the German Schutzstaffel (SS) grew from a mere eight
members to over a quarter of a million Waffen-SS and over a million Allgemeine-
SS members. The following 'list of SS personnel' gives the names of persons
who are counted among the organization's most famous, influential, and
notorious members.
categories: Lists of people by ideology|SS personnel
